product_details_and_care:
This premium leather sneaker started as a '70s running shoe that delivered revolutionary cushioning and performance and quickly became a fashion staple. Today it's an instantly recognizable icon that updates its timeless appeal with a plush interior and a logo-stamped plate gleaming from the laces.
Lace-up style
Leather upper/synthetic and textile lining/rubber sole
